gameDetails.name: Klondice
gameDetails.description:
Roll for the gold in this easy-to-learn game of strategy and luck. Players compete for gold but must beware: one false move could set opponents up for success. A shifting cart changes up the claim objectives for each round in this exciting game where a few good rolls and a strategy that pans out will leave everyone with Klondice fever!


     Game play combines the perfect balance of strategy and luck
     Easy to learn and play in 20 minutes
     Game includes gold glittery dice


—description from the publisher
